EmailTemplate.name: TM Outreach Template
EmailTemplate.subject: How's it going?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there {!Contact.FirstName},
Set some saved searches and we can bring vehicles to you. Looking for a specific car? Let me know, I can help!
We were founded BY a dealer FOR dealers like you. So if you have any questions or concerns with ACV, I would be more than happy to assist.
Thank you! {!Contact.Account_Owner_TM__c}
